body.class: mediawiki ltr ns-6 ns-subject page-File_Flag_of_Poland_svg skin-monobook

img.alt: File:Flag of Poland.svg

div.p: Flag_of_Poland.svg‎ (SVG file, nominally 1,280 × 800 pixels, file size: 345 B)

table.style: border:1px solid #aaa; background:#f9f9f9; font-size:90%; margin:.2em auto .2em auto;

td.big: This is a file from the Wikimedia Commons. The description on its description page there is shown below.
td.center: Commons is a freely licensed media file repository. You can help.

table.summary: A standardized table providing complete information about the file, including description of what it shows and how it was made, copyright status and source.

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; vertical-align: top; padding-right: 0.4em; width: 15%

td.div: English: flag of Poland, symbolic version in interpretation supported by majority of Polish wikipedians (100% for). As decided in this vote, the symbolic use of Polish flags/CoA should be based on simplified HTML named colors: white (#ffffff) and crimson (#dc143c). This, for instance, includes all templates and infoboxes with Polish Flag or Coat of Arms. Please note that this is not a normative version. The normative act of Polish law says it should look different, but does not directly say what it should look like in sRGB. See Image:Flag of Poland (normative).svg for the normative version converted by Wikipedians from CIE xyY color space to sRGB. For details on conversion and the description of Polish colors on Wikipedia, see Flag of Poland.

Polski: flaga Polski w interpretacji szeroko popieranej przez Polskich wikipedystów (100% za). Zgodnie z decyzją podjętą w tym głosowaniu, symboliczne użycie polskiej flagi/godła powinno być oparte o uproszczone kolory HTML: white (#ffffff) i crimson (#dc143c). Obejmuje to m.in. wszystkie szablony i infoboksy zawierające grafiki flagi czy godła. Należy zwrócić uwagę, że nie jest to wersja wzorcowa. Polska ustawa mówi o tym, że flaga powinna wyglądać inaczej chociaż nie precyzuje wprost jak flaga powinna wyglądać w przestrzeni sRGB. Image:Flag of Poland (normative).svg jest wersją ustawową flagi przeliczoną przez Wikipedystów z przestrzeni kolorów CIE xyY do sRGB. Szczegółowe informacje na temat konwersji i opis polskich kolorów w Wikipedii można znaleźć w artykule Barwy Rzeczypospolitej Polskiej.

th.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; white-space: nowrap

td.p: Own work, modified color values by text substitution in the existing file

td.style: background: #ccf; text-align: right; padding-right: 0.4em; font-weight: bold

ul.li: Image:Flag of Poland (bordered).svg (deprecated, use the |border| attribute, unless there is a good reason against it)

div.p: nb: two equal horizontal bands of white (top) and red; similar to the flags of Indonesia and Monaco which are red (top) and white
This file is ineligible for copyright. But just in case:

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

img.alt: Public domain

span.i: I, the copyright holder of this work, hereby release it into the public domain. This applies worldwide.

span.small: In case this is not legally possible:
span.i: I grant anyone the right to use this work for any purpose, without any conditions, unless such conditions are required by law.

table.style: width:100%; clear:both; margin:0.5em auto; background-color:#f7f8ff; border:2px solid #8888aa; direction: ltr;

img.alt: Public domain

td.span: This image is in the public domain because according to Article 4, case 2 of the Polish Copyright Law Act of February 4, 1994 (Dz. U. z 2006 r. Nr 90 poz. 631 with later changes) "normative acts and drafts thereof as well as official documents, materials, signs and symbols are not subject to copyrights". Hence it is assumed that this image has been released into public domain. However in some instances the use of this image in Poland might be regulated by other laws.
